title: Clearing Scoreboard
content: Hey quick question - how do I clear the scoreboards in Keens 1-6?

title: Re: Clearing Scoreboard
content:
I knows how![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img]

Delete the file CONFIG. for keen 4-6 and delete the file SCORES. for keen 1-3.

Deleting the CONFIG. in keen 4-6 will also reset your options.

If you have a newer version of keen dreams delete the KDREAMS.CFG file.

Dont worry about it being deleted it makes a new file with default scores.
